bioconda.name: bioconductor-iseq
bioconda.summary: Bayesian Hierarchical Modeling of ChIP-seq Data Through Hidden Ising Models

biotools.summary: This package uses Bayesian hidden Ising models to identify IP-enriched genomic regions from ChIP-seq data. It can be used to analyze ChIP-seq data with and without controls and replicates.

bioschemas.name: iSeq
bioschemas.summary: This package uses Bayesian hidden Ising models to identify IP-enriched genomic regions from ChIP-seq data. It can be used to analyze ChIP-seq data with and without controls and replicates.
